references.paper_title: Place units in the hippocampus of the freely moving rat
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of place cells, introducing the concept and providing initial experimental evidence supporting the idea that hippocampal neurons represent spatial location.

references.paper_title: Microstructure of a spatial map in the entorhinal cortex
references.reason: This paper is a landmark study that showed that grid cells in the entorhinal cortex provide a fundamental spatial representation that underlies place cell firing

references.paper_title: Independent codes for spatial and episodic memory in hippocampal neuronal ensembles
references.reason: This paper demonstrated that hippocampal place cells not only encode spatial information but also episodic memories, significantly advancing the understanding of place cell function.

references.paper_title: Geometric Determinants of the Place Fields of Hippocampal Neurons
references.reason: This paper provided key insights into how environmental geometry shapes the spatial tuning properties of hippocampal place cells

references.paper_title: The effects of changes in the environment on the spatial firing of hippocampal complex-spike cells
references.reason: This paper is highly influential in the study of hippocampal remapping, demonstrating how place cell activity changes dramatically when an animal moves between environments
